text: Manasutho is a 2002 Indian Telugu-language romantic film directed by A. S. Ravi Kumar Chowdary and produced by Venigalla Ananda Prasad. It music and background score were by Ashirwad. The film stars Akash, Arzoo Govitrikar.https://movies.fullhyderabad.com/manasutho/telugu/manasutho-movie- reviews-1918-2.html ==Plot== Manasutho is romantic drama concerning the relationship between Kanshik and Sapna. ==Cast== *Akash as Kanishk *Arzoo Govitrikar as Sapna *Brahmanandam *Sudha *Khayyum *Vijayabhaskar *AVS *Sudha Prasad Babu *Narra Venkateswara Rao *M.S. Narayana *Mamatha Chowdary * Sudeepa * Devisri *Abhijit * Bhasa * Gopi * Anil * SV Krishna Reddy * Chandan * Sweety * Sudhakar Komakula as Vizag Sudhakar ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Telugu-language films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Telugu-language films
title: Manasutho
